name: Mare Letalis
description:
This was made for the Week 161 Weekly Game Jam. The theme was "Pilot". This was  meant to be a game with an interesting story and tons of lore, but ended up being a piece of crap because I ran out of time. Lessons have been learnt from this nevertheless. 

According to the Cambridge English Dictionary,  one of the definitions of a pilot is  "a person with detailed knowledge of an area of water, such as that around a port, who goes onto a ship to direct it safely. "

https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/pilot
